sketches.label: A
sketches.colour: rgb(220, 220, 220) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box

sketches.label: bbbbb
sketches.colour: rgb(200, 100, 100) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box
sketches.code:
import math
t = 0

@jam.on_refresh
def ref():
    global t
    t += 0.05
    dx, dy = math.sin(t), math.cos(t)
    jam.canvas.clear()
    jam.canvas.ink(0, 0, 0)
    jam.canvas.line(50, 50, 50 + dx*70, 50+dy*70)

sketches.label: B
sketches.colour: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box
